@zshshr webgl

这边终于解决了这个问题，根据以上几位的指点，发现可能是因为gradle插件版本不一致的问题，导致项目中生成的libweexcore.so的目录路径跟weex源码库中weex_core下release.sh或debug.sh脚本中的路径不一样，所以执行sh脚本时copy文件失败，但不会报任何异常，我这边的处理方式是在写一个task任务来自己copy so文件到libs下，避免直接修改源码，导致后续升级sdk困难
> 用最新代码编译出来的playground跑起来是正常的，再check下看看？ 这版本不对吗？ @mahaiyannn
我们的APP使用的是这个版本的 [https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases/tag/0.19.0](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases/tag/0.19.0)

https://weex.apache.org/cn/who-is-using-weex.html
@hshm try to use `com.taobao.android:weex_inspector:0.18.10`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/244491/49427699-f8933f00-f7de-11e8-81cc-a98a7d4f554a.png)
LOL

Currently only a preliminary implementation, register components of the webgl engine layaair with registerComponents to the weex framework, and then adapt the following functions.
callCreateFinish
callUpdateFinish
callRefreshFinish
callCreateBody
callAddElement
callRemoveElement
callMoveElement
callUpdateAttrs
callUpdateStyle
callAddEvent
callRemoveEvent
callNativeModule
callNativeComponent
callNative

Use these functions to process the rendering instructions sent from weex,
The style follows the way weex exports to json.

The problem currently encountered is that when registering a component, the function name of the component is the same as the element handler function defined inside the weex framework, and the function that calls the element inside the framework is intercepted by the registered component function. In order to minimize the change to weex itself, I had to rename the registered component function name to "$" + the original function name.

I have already made an issue for this issue.(#1853).

@Hanks10100 I think that if a user-defined component function might override the function defined by the framework itself, the documentation should give a description, and those function names are reserved by the framework and cannot be defined by the user. Otherwise, the user must be familiar with the details of the framework to avoid intercepting the functionality of the framework itself.

Is it because src/router.js is an entry file that does not support hot updates? Modifying router. js of the. temp folder can be updated, but src/router. js is the source file. How to implement the modification of src/router.js to support hot updates? @erha19

@leixuesong you can use `node-watch` to watch file of `src/router.js`, then run the transform method to process it to `.temp/router`, and I think it's unnecessary to listen to a file that is modified infrequently.

@WeibinZheng Can you give us a pull request?

It doesn't matter which android studio version is.
Read gradle-wrapper.properties to find out the gradle version.

文件 WXScrollerComponent.mm
方法 - (void)scrollViewDidScroll:(UIScrollView *)scrollView
下面这一段代码中，REFRESH_PULLINGDISTANCE 下拉时返回的是负值，而在Android中是正值
```
    [_refreshComponent pullingdown:@{
             REFRESH_DISTANCE_Y: @(fabs((scrollView.contentOffset.y - _lastContentOffset.y)/scaleFactor)),
             REFRESH_VIEWHEIGHT: @(_refreshComponent.view.frame.size.height/scaleFactor),
             REFRESH_PULLINGDISTANCE: @(scrollView.contentOffset.y/scaleFactor),
             @"type":@"pullingdown"
    }];
```

iOS与Android顶起的原理不同，iOS根据edit在WXRootView中的位置计算出顶起的距离，默认是输入框下边缘+20像素。同时提供完成按钮。
